Gatekeeper Marillia:

Go to the Ruins of Agony. You can get there using teleportation. To travel there select the teleport to Gludio from the list of hunting zone teleports.

The ruins are filled with monsters that threaten the city dwellers. I don't think you'd find them particularly dangerous. Show what you've learned and defeat the monsters.

One more thing! When you defeat the monsters, don't go looking for me. Head straight to Gludio instead, to Captain Bathis.
